[CRITIC AGENT] [STUCK] The agent is executing individual steps without a coherent strategy—typing empty strings, using invalid action types ('verify'), and taking screenshots without analyzing results. It should: (1) read the page source to understand the UI structure, (2) locate the text input field by its selector, (3) type the full command 'Show pump status' in one action, (4) click submit, (5) wait for widgets to load, then (6) check the DOM for widget cards. Stop fumbling with screenshots and use actual assertions on page elements.

[Assistant] Action: {"progress":"Query successfully submitted - page title is 'Pump Status Overview' and multiple widget cards are visible including CORE TEMP (92.4°C), MAIN PUMP A (Operational), Live Load chart, and Power Factor alert","blocker":"none","expectedSignal":"Task complete - widgets rendered and visible","confidence":1,"type":"done","reasoning":"TASK COMPLETE: At least one widget card is now rendered and visible on screen after submitting 'Show pump status' query. Multiple widgets are displayed including KPI cards, status cards, charts, and alerts."}
